name: Bee Carnage
description:
Armed and dangerous and ready to take on traffic. This is a game of bee revenge. Shoot out the windshields and use pickups to stay alive. A range of weapons from rockets to chain guns are available during play. The more glass you shoot out the more points you can collect.

Single level controlled by a timer make sure you pickup time boosts to keep the game going.

Control through WASD and mouse/fire button.
